author.name: Madan Narra
author.description:
Madan is a software developer, writer, and enthusiast. 
He frequently publishes articles on getting things done using Java and related technologies & best practices for building microservice apps for large-scale applications.
author.landingPageDescription:
Madan is a software developer, writer, and enthusiast, and ex-failed-startup co-founder of Maatruka Software Technologies.
He has 10+ years of experience writing software with Java, JavaScript, Node.js. He writes about software design and architecture best practices with Java and is especially passionate about Microservices, API Development, Distributed Applications and Frontend Technologies.
